name: Hey There's Spiders.
description:
You are hans, you are in a field, you are wearing suspenders. Why is this?  Why should I know! Anyways there are some giants spiders, and some shopkeeper guy trying to sell you stuff. You should probably talk to him or something. Also you have 100 coins because you are very rich, and not because I forgot to turn off developer stuff at 3 AM. Maybe try playing the game a bit before you spend all your totally legitimate dough. 

Final Boss broke. Very sad.

Controls - Use your mouse to click stuff, and backspace to exit things. 

W A S D or the arrow keys for movement

C for bombs

Enter for sword stabbing.

Trailer is here.

Also I worked on this with two friends. Attributions.

https://github.com/mjholtzem/Unity-2D-Destruction/blob/master/unity2DDestruction...

A star pathifinding program 

https://www.google.com/url?q=https://arongranberg.com/astar/&sa=D&source=hangout...

Music Attributions 

Johnan Brodd - Battle In The Winter

Mikee Usa - Sad Piano

Scribe - Adventure Time
